description: Number of runs of even length in base 10 representation of n.
formula: a(n) = 1-[(n+1)^10 mod 11] with n>=0. - _Paolo P. Lava_, Nov 29 2006G.f.: x^11/(1-x^11); a(n) = 0^(n mod 11) = C(n-1,10) mod 11. - _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Oct 07 2014
prog: (MAGMA) [0^(n mod 11) : n in [1..100]]; // _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Oct 07 2014
author: _Clark Kimberling_
